item.title: Django Rosetta Installation
item.description: Install SciPy: sudo apt-get install python-numpy python-scipy python-matplotlib ipython ipython-notebook python-pandas python-sympy python-nose Install pymongo and nltk: sudo pip install pymongo sudo pip install nltk Install Python MySQLdb: sudo apt-get install python-mysqldb Install Rosetta: sudo pip install django-rosetta Add following into INSTALLED_APPS in settings.py: "rosetta", Add following into urls.py: url(r’^translations/’, include(‘rosetta.urls’)), To also allow language prefixes , change patters to i18n_patterns in urls.py: urlpatterns += i18n_patterns( ... )
